attributes.action: Give the British people the final say on any proposed final Brexit deal.
attributes.additional_details: When the referendum was held in 2016 nobody knew the details of the final deal and how leaving the EU would actually affect the UK. Now we know the full consequences of leaving the EU for the UK it is right that the people should have the final say.
attributes.background:
We call for the British public to have a vote on the proposed Brexit deal by holding an EU referendum on the final Brexit deal to be held in November 2018 after an adequate campaign period . 
The choice should be either to accept the deal or remain in the EU by revoking Article 50.
